skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Front-End development is a critical aspect of web development that focuses on creating the visual and interactive elements users encounter. Responsive design, a cornerstone in this field, ensures seamless experiences across devices. Diving into various frameworks, developers choose tools like React or Angular to enhance user interfaces. JavaScript, a dynamic scripting language, plays a pivotal role, enabling the creation of dynamic content and interactivity. As users increasingly demand richer experiences, Front-End developers continually refine their skills to craft visually appealing, efficient, and engaging websites and applications.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: At the core of web functionality lies Back-End development, handling server-side processes and database interactions. This discipline employs languages such as Python, Node.js, and PHP to create the logic powering web applications. Database management becomes paramount, influencing scalability and data security. Back-End developers navigate challenges related to data storage, retrieval, and server-side execution. Security considerations, such as protecting against vulnerabilities and ensuring data integrity, are integral. Ultimately, Back-End development is the engine driving the seamless functioning and performance of web applications, ensuring they meet user expectations and business requirements.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: UI and UX design form the bedrock of creating user-friendly and aesthetically pleasing digital experiences. UI design focuses on the look and feel, determining how users interact with interfaces. Meanwhile, UX design considers the overall user journey, emphasizing usability and satisfaction. Through iterative processes, designers create wireframes and prototypes, refining designs based on user feedback. The integration of user research informs decision-making, ensuring designs align with user needs and preferences. Accessibility and inclusivity are prioritized, making UI/UX design a holistic discipline that combines creativity, psychology, and technology to shape compelling and inclusive digital interactions.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: Webflow stands out as a versatile web development platform, offering a visual approach that empowers designers and developers alike. With its user-friendly interface, Webflow simplifies the development process, allowing for rapid prototyping and iterative design. Designers can leverage its capabilities to create responsive and interactive websites without delving into extensive coding. While Webflow caters to visual development, it accommodates custom code integration and third-party APIs, providing flexibility for advanced functionalities. As an innovative tool, Webflow streamlines the web development workflow, offering a bridge between design and development, and facilitating the creation of modern, visually stunning websites.

portfolio.title: Fall King
portfolio.description: Fall King is a 2D vertical platformer built in Unity using C Sharp. Play as a knight and fall as far as you can while avoiding obstacles and enemies. Worked on creating game objects that interact with the game world and the player. Implemented the movement as well as the physics for the player to glide down and interact with the game world. Designed the AI system for two types of enemies that behave differently when the player is in range. Integrated Unity's new input system and separated the logic between hardware input, interactions, and actions.

portfolio.title: Flutter Weather App using API
portfolio.description: A simple Flutter app to display current weather information based on user-inputted city names and uses an API to retrieve weather information from city name inputted. Display current weather information including temperature, wind speed, humidity, etc. User can input the city name to get weather details. Visual representation of weather conditions with icons.

portfolio.title: Dijkstra's Algorithm Visualization
portfolio.description: This web application allows users to visualize the famous Dijkstra's algorithm in action for finding the shortest path in a graph. Use the controls to create a graph, set start and end nodes, and visualize Dijkstra's algorithm in action.
